Text:
wow man thanks for completing my request. didn't really hope you would actually do it. i had been looking for their first studio album for like an year & a half now. thanks again. it's just amazing how each song by this band is pure awesomeness. it's kinda disappointing that you didn't add the splits, eps 
& compilations. can't ask you for the split eps(i know that would be just impossible) but can you add the eps Hospitals (2006) & Trying to Breathe 7" (2010) & the compilation album All Things Move Toward Their End (2007).
